tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE influencer_sentiment_analysis (
    influencer_id INT,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
    comment_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_comments (
    comment_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_engagement (
    engagement_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    shares_count INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_profiles (
    influencer_id INT,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
    follower_count INT,
    bio_text TEXT,
    industry_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_text VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sentiment_score INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_engagement (
    engagement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT NOT NULL,
    likes INT,
    comments_count INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_profiles (
    influencer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    followers_count INT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    joined_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis_results (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_id INT NOT NULL,
    sentiment_label VARCHAR(50),
    confidence_level DECIMAL,
    analyzed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EngagementMetrics (
    engagement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);
